meanings.definition: Make or become smarter or more intelligent.
meanings.sent1: Reading books can help you smarten up your mind.
meanings.sent2: Studying regularly can smarten your thinking abilities.
meanings.sent3: The talking robot tried to smarten itself by learning new words.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about the world smartened her understanding.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle game was designed to smarten players' problem-solving skills.

meanings.sent1: Adding a bow tie can smarten up your outfit.
meanings.sent2: A fresh coat of paint can smarten the look of a room.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried to smarten his appearance by wearing a suit.
meanings.sent4: The new haircut smartened her overall look.
meanings.sent5: The designer dress was meant to smarten the wearer's style.
